attributes.action: Add Highlights of England's Away International Football Matches to the list of sporting events that must be shown on free-to-air terrestrial TV.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Setanta would not sell the highlights of the Croatia v England match to a terrestrial channel. Therefore there are no highlights available to those who do not have setanta sport. I think that highlighs of all England's away matches should be available on a free to air channel if the match isn't broadcast live on free to air TV.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
